laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal DPP-4 activity one week after stopping sitagliptin therapy.
Heterozygous Thr328Lys mutation in the gene for coagulation factor XII, characteristic of type III hereditary angioedema.
Reduced carboxypeptidase N activity at 27.9 nmol/min/mL (normal range, 35.7 to 55.3 nmol/min/mL).
